about_the_game:
Welcome to the Casual and Social Games music pack by Sonancy Designs, featuring 15 unique songs that are happy in tone and are set for creating a fun and quirky atmosphere in your latest RPG.

The Casual and Social Games music pack is the right soundtrack for creating delightful encounters with main characters, exploring unique towns, and even visiting the darkest of dungeons in the middle of it all. This soundtrack is perfect for establishing a happy and unique mood for your brand new world.

Features:

* 15 songs in ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats
* Royalty-free music for your games!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
